text: Everybody Changes () is a 2019 Panamanian drama film directed by Arturo Montenegro. It was selected as the Panamanian entry for the Best International Feature Film at the 92nd Academy Awards, but it was not nominated. ==Plot== A married father of three comes out as a trans woman. ==Cast== * Leonte Bordanea * Gaby Gnazzo * Marisín Luzcando * Andrea Pérez Meana ==See also== * List of submissions to the 92nd Academy Awards for Best International Feature Film * List of Panamanian submissions for the Academy Award for Best International Feature Film ==References== ==External links== * Category:2019 films Category:2019 drama films Category:2019 LGBT-related films Category:Panamanian films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Films about trans women Category:Panamanian LGBT-related films
title: Everybody Changes
